      • derive

        public Environment derive(java.awt.Point newCurrentLocation)
        A factory method that clones this Environment, creating a new derived one with the currentLocation given as parameter. Use this to create new derived environments and not the public constructor, which is intended only to be used the first time the environment is created.
        Returns:
        the new derived Environment
